title: President Donald J. Trump Is Working to Create a Future of Opportunity and Prosperity for All Americans – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Law & Justice	

Issued on:
October 25, 2019
America wins when citizens with a criminal record can contribute to their communities as law-abiding members of our society.
						Donald J. Trump					CREATING A FAIRER JUSTICE SYSTEM AND MAKING COMMUNITIES SAFER: President Trump’s criminal justice reforms offer Americans a second chance and keep our communities safe. OFFERING A SECOND CHANCE: The President is advancing second chance hiring to break down employment barriers for former inmates and give them the best possible chance to succeed. LIFTING UP ALL AMERICANS: These reforms build on President Trump’s vow to ensure that no community is forgotten and that everyone has the ability to achieve the American dream.
